griddisplay: Yes (Rule of Thirds, Square 4x6, Diagonal & Square     4x4, Off)
antidust: Charge protection coating on Low-Pass Filter and     electromagnetic vibration mechanism
exposurebracketing: 3 continuous or single shots in 1/3 or 2/3 EV steps
weight: Main unit only: 7.4 oz / 209.78 g With battery and     Memory Stick PRO Duo: 9.5 oz / 269.32 g
autoexposurelock: Yes with shutter button (can be disabled from menu),     custom button set available
whitebalancemode: Auto WB / Daylight / Shade / Cloudy / Incandescent /     Fluorescent (Warm White / Cool White / Day White / Daylight) / Flash /     Color Temperature (2500 to 9900K) & Color Filter (G7 to M7: 15-steps, A7     to B7: 15-steps) / Custom / Underwater
exposurecompensation: Still images +/-3.0 EV(1/3EV steps selectable)     Movies: +/-2.0 EV(1/3EV steps selectable)
phototvhd: Yes, with BRAVIA Sync enabled HDTV and HDMI cable
panoramastillimagesize: Horizontal Wide: 12,416 x 1,856 (23M) Horizontal     Std.: 8,192 x 1,856 (15M) Vertical Wide: 2,160 x 5,536 (12M) Vertical     Std.: 2,160 x 3,872 (8.4M)
videomode: AVCHD: FX - 1920 x 1080/60i at 24Mbps FH - 1920 x     1080/60i at 17Mbps FX - 1920 x 1080/24p at 24Mbps FH - 1920 x 1080/24p     at 17Mbps MP4: HD - 1440 x 1080/ 30p at 12Mbps VGA - 640 x 480/ 30p at     3Mbps
exposuresettings: iAUTO, Superior Auto, Programmed AE (P), Aperture     priority (A), Shutter priority (S), Manual (M), Sweep Panorama, Scene     Selection, Movie
imagingsensor: Exmor APS HD CMOS sensor (23.5 X 15.6mm)
numberofstillimages: Approx. 420 images with LCD monitor (CIPA standard)
colortemperature: 2500 to 9900K & Color Filter (G7 to M7: 15-steps, A7     to B7: 15-steps), Custom, Underwater
memorycardslot: Dual compatibility slot: Memory Stick PRO Duo/Pro-HG     Duo/PRO-HG HX Duo media - SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card
mediatype: Memory Stick PRO Duo/Pro-HG Duo media; SD, SDHC and     SDXC memory card
stillimagefileformat: JPEG (DCF Ver. 2.0, Exif Ver. 2.3, MPF baseline     compliant), RAW (Sony ARW 2.3 format)
drivemode: Single-shot, Continuous, Speed Priority Continuous,     Self-timer (10/2 sec. delay), Self-timer (Cont.) (with 10 sec. delay;     3/5 exposures), Bracketing
scenemodes: Portrait, Landscape, Macro, Sports Action, Sunset,     Night Portrait, Night View, Hand-held Twilight, Anti Motion Blur
avremoteterminal: Yes, via optional RM-VPR1 wired Multi-terminal remote
lenscompatibility: Sony E-mount, operation with Minolta/Konica Minolta     Maxxum A-mount lenses confirmed via optional LA-EA adaptor
focussensitivity: EV 0 to 20 EV (at ISO100 equivalent, with F2.8 lens     attached)
creativestyle: Standard, Vivid, Portrait, Landscape, Sunset, Black &     White (Contrast (-3 to +3steps), Saturation(-3 to +3steps), Sharpness(-3     to +3steps)
continuousshootingspeed: Continuous mode: 2.5 fps, Speed Priority Continuous     mode: 3.5 fps
focusarea: Wide (Multi Point/ 25 points), Zone, Center-weighted,     Flexible Spot (Small, Medium, Large)
nfc: Yes (NFC Forum Type 3 Tag compatible, One-touch     remote, One-touch sharing)
hdoutput: HDMI micro connector (Type-D), BRAVIA Sync (link     menu), PhotoTV HD, 4K still image playback
pictureeffect: 13 modes (Posterization (Color, B/W), Pop Color,     Retro Photo, Partial Color (R, G, B, Y), High Contrast Monochrome, Toy     Camera, Soft High-key, Soft Focus, HDR Painting, Rich-tone Monochrome,     Miniature, Watercolor, Illustration)
afmodes: Single-shot AF (AF-S), Continuous AF (AF-C), Direct     Manual Focus (DMF), Manual Focus
colorspace: Still: sRG, AdobeRGB Movie: xvYCC standard (x.v.Color     when connected via HDMI cable) compatible with TRILUMINOS color
flashmodes: Flash off, Auto flash, Fill-flash, Slow Sync., Rear     Sync, Red-eye reduction (On/Off)
iso: Stills: ISO 100-16000 selectable in 1 EV steps, Auto     (100-3200) Movies: ISO 100-3200 selectable in 1 EV steps, Auto     (200-3200)
flashcoverage: 16 mm (focal length printed on lens body)
meteringsensitivity: EV 0 to 20 EV (at ISO100 equivalent, with F2.8 lens     attached)
